content: **knitted and felted mittens in drops nepal ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #chestnutcuddlemittens drops design pattern ne-401 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m m/l l/xl mitten-length after felting approx 23-25½-26½ cm mitten-length before felting 33-35½-37 cm length from thumb after felting approx 12½-13-13½ cm length from thumb before felting 18-18½-19 cm **yarn** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150-200 g colour 8917 walnut **needles** drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm **knitting gauge** 16 stitches in width and 21 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 5 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm after felting 21 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
